Submodules¶

carlhauser_server.instance_handler module¶

class carlhauser_server.instance_handler.Instance_Handler[source]¶

Bases: object

Handle a server instance

check_db_startstop()[source]¶

Create a Singleton instance of DB handler if none is present :return: Nothing. Change the state of the instance handler object (itself)

check_worker()[source]¶

Check workers status :return: True if at least one worker alive, False otherwise

check_worker_startstop()[source]¶

Create a Singleton instance of DB handler if none is present :return: Nothing.

flush_db()[source]¶

Flush the database. Use at your own risks ! You will loose data ! :return: Nothing

flush_workers()[source]¶

Flush all workers. Kill them all and forget it. Goes away from the past. :return: True if all workers had been killed and removed from lists.

launch()[source]¶

Launch a full server : Databases, workers (webservice to adder), wait for startup and check status of everything :return: Nothing

prevent_workers_shutdown()[source]¶

Remove the halt key from the database. Useful on launch to prevent worker to shutdown when they start from a recovered database. :return: Nothing

shutdown_workers()[source]¶

Stop workers and wait for their shutdown :return: True if all workers are shutdown, False otherwise

start_adder_workers()[source]¶

Start adder workers (which add pictures from queue to the database) :return: Nothing

start_database(wait=False)[source]¶

Start the database, with all redis and wait until running :param wait: bool, if True, will wait until db is started :return: Nothing

start_feature_workers()[source]¶

Start feature workers (which compute features from pictures from queueto an other queue) :return: Nothing

start_requester_workers()[source]¶

Start requester workers (which request pictures from queue to the database) :return: Nothing

start_webservice()[source]¶

Start API webservice (Flask) to handle client requests :return: Nothing

stop()[source]¶

Stop everything. Webservice, workers, and database :return: Nothing

stop_database(wait=False)[source]¶

Stop the database, with all redis, and wait until stopped :param wait: bool, if True, will wait until db is stopped :return: Nothing

stop_webservice()[source]¶

Stop the webservice which handle clients requests :return: Nothing

carlhauser_server.instance_handler.exit_gracefully(signum, frame)[source]¶

restore the original signal handler as otherwise evil things will happen in raw_input when CTRL+C is pressed, and our signal handler is not re-entrant signal.signal(signal.SIGINT, original_sigint) # TODO : To put back ? :param signum: ? Automatic :param frame: ? Automatic :return: ? Automatic
